doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Albert Urmanov
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Depot/Station by Albert Urmanov

main.head: Depot/Station
main.p: Albert is a twenty-five year old artist from Anshero-Sudshensk, Russia. His passion for art manifested in school, where he would draw superhero fanart for his classmates. He later went on to become a designer for several media agencies and a freelance artist before landing his current job, an internship as a concept artist at Goodgame Studios in Hamburg. Aside from creating art, he enjoys akido, anime, and hanging out with his wife and friends.
